import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterOutlet } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [RouterOutlet], templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'JaiSriRam Travels'; }
